html:
9.22.20  5:25 pm   what editor do you use

      we'll see (i hate them all)

9.22.20  5:00 pm   What's the best Wi-Fi name you've seen?

      i have never seen a good wi-fi name

9.22.20  4:16 pm   what's a thing

      could be you

9.22.20  4:14 pm   so this new song of yours will be the 3rd one that's over 4 minutes long (at least, according to the songs listed on your snogs page). How does it feel to make longer songs?

     not good, so if i am doing it that must mean that the song has to feel extra good to counter balance the non-good ramifications of the extra length

      Ideally how long would you want your songs to be?

     between 2:00 and 3:30

     Of all the songs you've written so far (but not recorded/released), how long do you estimate your longest one is?

     the one i am working on now was always known to be the longest, it's been listed as 4:52 for years, but i always assumed it would get a rewrite, and presumably get shorter. which is true, although i really couldn't get it below 4:10

     and how many words does the next song contain?

     i'm not sure. i've decided that counting them is not the best use of my time at this particular moment

     thank you!

9.22.20  3:48 pm   what shape is the universe?

      this may not be what you want to hear, but it's shaped like you

9.22.20  3:44 pm   why does the sun exist

      someone's gotta do it

9.22.20  3:31 pm   when is the next vid coming out?

      i could tell you what i think, but there is a risk i might be wrong, and be chastised for it. and if there's one thing i know about 2020 it's that i'm sick of being chastised

9.22.20  3:15 pm   For your videos do you feel pressured by the public to do what they want

     not even close

     or do you feel as if they should enjoy you for you as a person instead of your content?

     they might enjoy either/neither/both. we'll see

      also I really like your song (not a question)

9.22.20  3:08 pm   What is your opinion on giraffes?

      they are not only tall, but also very wide

9.22.20  2:36 pm   9.21.20  7:59 am If I don't I will fail school and have to live in an alleyway in Bosnia for the rest of my life

      ok, then, the next question is, to what degree do you want or not want that. examples: want it, don't want it, really really really really really want it, would prefer not have it, etc

9.22.20  2:01 pm   Is the world flat?

      it used to be but now it's a little bent

9.22.20  2:00 pm   advice on being as cool as you?

      damn it you can do better than that

9.22.20  1:46 pm   How do I do a magic 

      be alive

9.22.20  1:37 pm   when is the next vid coming out

      i could tell you what i think, but there is a risk i might be wrong, and be chastised for it. and if there's one thing i know about 2020 it's that i'm sick of being chastised

9.22.20  1:27 pm   how do you feel about how broken the school system is?

      i am not familiar with the system

9.22.20  1:19 pm   are you cool? 

      getting there

9.22.20  1:06 pm   I think I can write great songs but they just don't sound like my own style. At what point do I start developing my own style?

     whenever you want

      Whenever I try, I just end up sounding like the music I'm listening to at that time. I really like the songs but I'm not really doing anything *different*. Help?

     here's a good trick. instead of making them the amount of 'different' you might have had in mind, try making them 50 times more different than that. make them so different that you run the risk of making them terrible. the thing about this is, the music will get mad and get revenge on you by becoming good, and because you already flung everything out so far into different land, the path from terrible to good will be unique. and also that's the best part about music, is the path from bad to good. not when it's just good, because then there's no path and you don't really get to go anywhere

9.22.20  1:06 pm   where did you get the pants you wear in "Hello Sexy Pants"?

      it's plausible i may have gotten them from the clothing store

9.22.20  12:56 pm   is shrek god?

      i thought shrek was you

9.22.20  12:53 pm   does music express emotion or can music only express its inherent self?

      music expresses emotion

9.22.20  12:41 pm   what is your opinion on austria

      really it all comes down to the wiener schnitzel

9.22.20  12:23 pm   Whats the difference between crazy and not crazy? 

      craziness

9.22.20  12:19 pm   any improv tips

      bad things have a tendency to trigger good things. this is not necessarily a tip, because you can't really control this very much, but it's just a comment

9.22.20  12:14 pm   Do you press buttons

      yes

9.22.20  11:41 am   why are your songs so goddamn good?

      could be some kind of defense mechanism

9.22.20  11:26 am   what is grass

      a perfect way to test the limits of the computational power of your universe

9.22.20  11:18 am   if your favorite soft can't run on your current os you can just run it in a virtual machine you know

      there are 2 problems with that. the first problem is that i have no favorite software because i hate all software for not being fast enough. and the second problem is that a virtual machine does not make software get faster

9.22.20  11:05 am   there's a word for my situation, but i can't think of it. what is it?

      i don't think english has that word but they might have it in japanese

9.22.20  10:41 am   Did you ever decide if you might quit school or not?

      i thought that story was about you

9.22.20  10:08 am   will there be live action in the new video or just animation?

      both i think

9.22.20  9:58 am   What are semicolons used for?

      when you just can't handle an entire colon

9.22.20  9:44 am   Is this the darkest timeline?

      yes, while also being the lightest and most medium

9.22.20  9:31 am   Have you heard of the Tetris effect? It's when people played so much Tetris that they started having abstract dreams of Tetris.

Do you have that sort of thing (often)?

     yes

     You mentioned that the melody of "might quit" came to you in a dream.

     yes but i don't think it resembled anything from the previous day, at least i hope it didn't

9.22.20  9:26 am   Can you tell us the subject of the next video?

      happiness, rage,

9.22.20  9:13 am   do you prefer realism

      compared to what

9.22.20  9:01 am   what inspires you to make music?

      literally everything

9.22.20  8:44 am   when next vid

      i could tell you what i think, but there is a risk i might be wrong, and be chastised for it. and if there's one thing i know about 2020 it's that i'm sick of being chastised

9.22.20  8:33 am   Why are the things?

      it's what you requested

9.22.20  8:23 am   Is the song Might Quit telling the story of you starting to learn new tools for your art and then deciding to instead take take a detour to make this song called Might Quit?

     no. i didn't start to get the idea for switching all the tools until after i was done with the audio for the song that would have come after that, and when i started doing the video for it

9.22.20  8:16 am   Honest question: what time signature is i wanna be in a movie star in?

      mostly 9/4, but the verses and bridge may have certain deviations from that

9.22.20  8:14 am   A lot of times I can't create stuff because I feel too ashamed of my art, do you ever feel that?

      yes

9.22.20  7:27 am   will you tell us when your next video will come out if we promise not to chastise you?

      who is "we"

9.22.20  7:00 am   do you ever make music in other genres

      every genre is other

9.22.20  5:04 am   Does hard work always pays off?

      no

9.22.20  4:50 am   what are the primary themes of your next video?

      happiness, rage,

9.22.20  4:49 am   Is cereal soup

      cereal is nothing

9.22.20  2:27 am   why do I feel like a bean 

      you might be the chosen one

9.22.20  2:15 am   is a liquid a really super fine powder or what

      no

      what the heck is a music genre

      i can't tell you
